title: Motley Fool Money: 08.27.2010
description: Aflac CEO Dan Amos talks about the business behind the duck.  Drive author Dan Pink talks about the business of motivation. Corporate Library co-founder Nell Minow talks about the movie business.  And journalist Eamon Javers talks corporate espionage.
content:encoded: Aflac CEO Dan Amos talks about the business behind the duck.  Drive author Dan Pink talks about the business of motivation. Corporate Library co-founder Nell Minow talks about the movie business.  And journalist Eamon Javers talks corporate espionage.
